entry.title: Julien added 'The Making of Casablanca: Bogart, Bergman, and World War II'
entry.content: 📚 “The Making of Casablanca: Bogart, Bergman, and World War II” by Aljean Harmetz ⭐️ Rated: 4/5 📝 "How do you write a making-of book about one of the greatest films of all time when, famously, nothing chaotic ever happened on set? You write its biography instead. Aljean Harmetz has crafted a captiv..." 🏷️ #AljeanHarmetz

entry.title: Julien added 'Malayland'
entry.content: 📚 “Malayland” by Dina Zaman ⭐️ Rated: 2/5 📝 "Malayland is an interesting book in theory, but in practice, it often feels like a long reading list disguised as an argument. At just 147 pages, it should be a concise, engaging exploration of Malays..." 🏷️ #DinaZaman

entry.content: 📚 “The Case of the Ice-cold Hands” by Erle Stanley Gardner ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "The Case of the Ice-Cold Hands is a later entry in the Perry Mason series, but Gardner still brings the punch.
